description:
This plugin allows you to display timestamps in a less exact, more readable format such as:
- "3 days ago"
- "in a couple of hours"
- "a year ago"
- "just now"

Users input a start date/time and an end date/time, the plugin calculates the difference in time and returns it as a text string. An empty start or end value will register as the current date/time. 

Library: https://github.com/philbooth/vagueTime.js
name: VagueTime Timestamps
plugin_instructions:
- Add the VagueTime element to your page
- Input a start date and time and/or end date and time
- Reference the "Timestamp string" field on the VagueTime element to receive the time difference in text form
